The Big Bang Theory Ending in Sight?《生活大爆炸》将要完结了？

The Big Bang Theory won't go on forever. 《生活大爆炸》不会永远演下去。

The hit CBS sitcom—seriously, we mean hit, its ratings are insane—was just renewed for three more years.这部极其火爆的CBS情景喜剧——是真的很火爆，它的排名简直像疯了一样——刚刚续订了三年。

That means it'll be on TV for at least a total of 10 seasons. 这意味着这部剧至少可以拍满十季。

After that? Well, it might go the way of the dinosaurs...and live on in syndication forever.在这之后会怎么样呢？它可能就会像恐龙一样灭绝了，然后永远的躺在辛迪加组织中。

"I'm going to move forward along with [co-creator] Chuck [Lorre] that 10 is the end unless we're told otherwise," show runner Steve Molaro told the reporter. 节目操作者Steve Molaro告诉记者：“我将和我的搭档Chuck一起继续写下去，并且认为第十季就是结尾了，除非有人出面继续续订。”

"These are decisions that are so far away I can't really even think about that. “这些都是很遥远的决定，我现在还不能去想。

I have no choice but to move forward … it's so far away…我现在不得不继续前进，那是很遥远的事。

The mindset is it's going to be the 10 and then we'll see what happens after that."我们认为肯定是有十季的，然后我们会等待看在那之后会发生些别的什么事。”

Molaro told us they do talk about how the show may end, but there is no set ending in mind.Molaro告诉记者他们确实谈论过这部剧应该如何结束的问题，但是现在还没有一个定数。

"My concern is that we do it right and we end this show in a way that is as befitting of these characters that we respect and love," he said. 他说，“我认为我们应该好好想想，以一个合适这些我们都喜爱并尊敬的角色们的方式来结束这部剧。”

"As long as we can have the opportunity to end it in a way that serves them all properly, that's my concern—more than the number of seasons."“我认为重要的是以一种能够适合所有角色的方式来结束这部剧，这对我来说比一共可以拍几季更加重要。”

CBS recently became the home of Thursday night football games, putting The Big Bang Theory, which airs at 8 p.m., in a sort of limbo.CBS最近经常播周四晚的足球赛，因此使晚上八点播出的《生活大爆炸》处于尴尬的境地。

But CBS likely won't sideline the highest-rated comedy on TV until November.但是CBS应该不会在11月之前停播这部排名最靠前的喜剧。

Look for The Big Bang Theory to probably premiere on a different night before moving back to its regular Thursday home.所以他们想要在周四晚间时段空出来之前换一天播出《生活大爆炸》这部剧。
